arabicText: وَمَن يَقْنَطُ مِن رَّحْمَةِ رَبِّهِ إِلَّا الضَّالُّونَ
translationText: And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?

arabicText: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ ۚ
translationText: Say, 'O My servants who have transgressed against themselves, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.'

arabicText: إِنَّهُۥ لَا يَيْـَٔسُ مِن رَّوْحِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
translationText: Indeed, no one despairs of relief from Allah except the disbelieving people.

arabicText: إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
translationText: Indeed, the mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good.
And ever is He, to the believers, Merciful.

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُنَزِّلُ ٱلْغَيْثَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا قَنَطُوا۟
translationText: And He is the one who sends down rain after they had despaired.
So, indeed with hardship comes ease.

arabicText: رَّبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا
translationText: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us.

arabicText: وَعَسَىٰ أَن تَكْرَهُوا شَيْـًۭٔا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ
translationText: And perhaps you hate a thing while it is good for you.
Indeed, with hardship will be ease.

arabicText: فَٱللهُ خَيْرٌ حَـٰفِظًۭا ۖ وَهُوَ أَرْحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
translationText: But Allah is the best guardian, and He is the Most Merciful of the merciful.
